name: Vape Nation (G4C)
description:
For best experience, play in Fullscreen mode and use a joypad.

Keyboard controls:

Move with WASD or arrow keys. Interact with objects and people with "Z" and shoot with "X".

Joypad controls:

Move with analog stick. Interact with objects and people with "A" and shoot with "X". Controls may vary depending on your controller.
